Fayetteville.Fayetteville Technical Community College: Fayetteville Technical Community College (often shortened to FTCC or Fay Tech) is a two-year college located in Fayetteville, North Carolina. The institution is accredited by the Southern Association of Colleges and Schools Commission on Colleges (SACSCOC) and is a member of the North Carolina Community College System. FTCC serves more than 41,000 students annually by providing over 190 occupational, technical, general education, college transfer, and continuing education programs.
